description: Updates the platform software of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster for security patching. To learn how to use this API, see Update the SageMaker HyperPod platform software of a cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: Specify the name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster you want to update for security patching.

parameters.name: InstanceGroups
parameters.description: The array of instance groups for which to update AMI versions. (dict) --- The configuration that describes specifications of the instance groups to update. The name of the instance group to update.

nested_params.name: InstanceGroupName
nested_params.description: The name of the instance group to update.

parameters.name: DeploymentConfig
parameters.description: The configuration to use when updating the AMI versions. RollingUpdatePolicy (dict) --- The policy that SageMaker uses when updating the AMI versions of the cluster. The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can update at a time. Specifies whether SageMaker should process the update by amount or percentage of instances. Specifies the amount or percentage of instances SageMaker updates at a time. RollbackMaximumBatchSize (dict) --- The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can roll back at a time. WaitIntervalInSeconds (integer) --- The duration in seconds that SageMaker waits before updating more instances in the cluster. AutoRollbackConfiguration (list) --- An array that contains the alarms that SageMaker monitors to know whether to roll back the AMI update. (dict) --- The details of the alarm to monitor during the AMI update. The name of the alarm.

nested_params.name: RollingUpdatePolicy
nested_params.description: The policy that SageMaker uses when updating the AMI versions of the cluster.

nested_params.name: MaximumBatchSize
nested_params.description: The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can update at a time.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Specifies whether SageMaker should process the update by amount or percentage of instances.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Specifies the amount or percentage of instances SageMaker updates at a time.

nested_params.name: RollbackMaximumBatchSize
nested_params.description: The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can roll back at a time.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Specifies whether SageMaker should process the update by amount or percentage of instances.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Specifies the amount or percentage of instances SageMaker updates at a time.

nested_params.name: WaitIntervalInSeconds
nested_params.description: The duration in seconds that SageMaker waits before updating more instances in the cluster.

nested_params.name: AutoRollbackConfiguration
nested_params.description: An array that contains the alarms that SageMaker monitors to know whether to roll back the AMI update.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster being updated for security patching.
